# CallCatcher Ops

> Missed call recovery and appointment booking automation for local service businesses.

## Canonical
- https://callcatcherops.com/callcatcherops/

## Key Pages
- https://callcatcherops.com/callcatcherops/
- https://callcatcherops.com/callcatcherops/intake.html
- https://callcatcherops.com/callcatcherops/thanks.html

## Service Definition
CallCatcher Ops helps service businesses recover missed inbound calls, follow up quickly with compliant SMS/callback workflows, and turn recovered leads into booked appointments.

## Ideal Customers
- Home services companies
- Med spas and clinics
- Dental and health practices
- Local franchises with call-driven lead flow

## Outcomes
- Fewer lost phone leads
- Faster response time after missed calls
- More booked appointments from existing demand
- Clear attribution of recovered revenue

## Pricing Docs
- https://github.com/IgorGanapolsky/storage-scout/blob/main/business/callcatcherops/pricing.md
- https://github.com/IgorGanapolsky/storage-scout/blob/main/business/callcatcherops/system.md
